record

public void record(String sourceName,
                   String eventType,
                   org.joda.time.DateTime eventTimestamp,
                   Map<String,Object> samples,
                   InternalCallContext context)
Main entry point to the timeline subsystem. Record a series of sample for a given source, at a given timestamp.

Parameters:
sourceName - name of the source
eventType - event category
eventTimestamp - event timestamp
samples - samples to record
context - the call context
